title: items list
body: great new presentation of the new home screen....but i cant find the list of items for champs anywhere

replies.body: Assuming you are referring to the Alpha client, I don't believe item lists are activated for testing.  I'm not in the know about alpha issues right now, so reach out to the alpha community and testers through the [alpha boards ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/AMiK4QqL-alpha-client-wont-work)for any feedback.  Thanks for your help!
